original_text: “A man named Ananias came to see me. He was a devout observer of the law and highly respected by all the Jews living there.
korean_text: 율법에 따라 경건한 사람으로 거기 사는 모든 유대인들에게 칭찬을 듣는 아나니아라 하는 이가

sentences.original_text: A man named Ananias came to see me.
sentences.korean_translation: 아나니아라는 한 사람이 나를 보러 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was a devout observer of the law.
He was highly respected by all the Jews.
